Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class Frame extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • gameScreen

          GameScreen gameScreen

    • Class GameScreen extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • map

          GameMap map
          Initializes instances of all the necessary classes. Random is used to pick a random image for lofgren. The timer calls actionPerformed (an action listener) every 50 ms. im and am are used for the keybindings. Step is used to check if the player has completed certain parts of the game.

        • character

          Character character

        • gui

          GUI gui

        • random

          java.util.Random random

        • fullscreen

          FullScreen fullscreen

        • sound

          Sound sound

        • timer

          javax.swing.Timer timer

        • im

          javax.swing.InputMap im

        • am

          javax.swing.ActionMap am

        • goal

          javax.swing.JLabel goal

        • step

          int step

        • moveUp

          javax.swing.Action moveUp
          The following actions determine what happens when a key is pressed or released. The moveUp, moveDown, moveLeft, and moveRight actions update the map location and character animation. stop stops the character from moving. exit closes the game screen. action closes the instruction screen lofgren opens up the lofgren JLabel and plays a scream sound. It opens the game over screen when pressed again.

        • moveDown

          javax.swing.Action moveDown

        • moveLeft

          javax.swing.Action moveLeft

        • moveRight

          javax.swing.Action moveRight

        • stop

          javax.swing.Action stop

        • exit

          javax.swing.Action exit

        • action

          javax.swing.Action action

        • lofgren

          javax.swing.Action lofgren
